{"id":932313491,"question_id":2659,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681278746,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/932313491/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Even and Odd Bits","memory":"42.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] evenOddBit(int n) {\n        String s = Integer.toBinaryString(n);\n        s = new StringBuilder(s).reverse().toString();\n        int len = s.length();\n        int even=0;\n        int odd=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            if(s.charAt(i)=='1' && i%2==0)\n                even++;\n            else if(s.charAt(i)=='1' && i%2==1)\n                odd++;\n        }\n        \n        return new int[]{even, odd};\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-even-and-odd-bits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
